name: furtive
content:

(of people) behaving secretly and often dishonestly, or (of actions) done secretly and often dishonestly: furtive glance I saw him cast a furtive glance at the woman at the table to his right. He made one or two furtive phone calls.furtive about There was something furtive about his behaviour and I immediately felt suspicious.
